long_description: The Harmony Kayak Konsole helps keep on-board necessities within easy reach. The Harmony Kayak Konsole fits most recreational kayaks and secures via a bungee to cockpit rim. 8 in. hatch creates a dry seal and protects water-sensitive gear. Hatch covers feature a hinged design and locking lever; to open hatch, simply slide lever to unlock cover and flip open to access gear. Includes mesh pocket, gear tray, recessed mounting surfaces for rod holders and universal cup holder.
short_description: The Harmony Kayak Konsole helps keep on-board necessities within easy reach.
